page.title: 02GENERAL VIEW 2
page.content: The northern part of our block is bounded and blocked by Droves and Drains.There are 3 droves,originally for sheep driving and now used for access to fields.Ashmead Drive is used to gain access to the wildfowl reserve.Witcombe Bottom main drain has been widened as part of the relief channel draining water from Ilchester to the pumping station on the river Yeo.The drains mean good farmland instead of marshes,but in bad winters flooding is common.The wildfowl reserve is privately owned and has been excavated and flooded to attract wild fowl.
